mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_card(id,summary, content,code,deadline, sort_number, author, procedure_id) VALUES (#{card.id},#{card.summary}, #{card.content},#{card.code},#{card.deadline}, (SELECT max_sort_number from (SELECT CASE WHEN max(sort_number) IS NULL THEN 0 ELSE max(sort_number)+1 end as max_sort_number FROM kb_card WHERE procedure_id=#{card.procedureId} ) as t ), #{userName}, #{card.procedureId})
mapper.update:
UPDATE kb_card SET summary = #{card.summary}, content = #{card.content}, code = #{card.code},
deadline = #{card.deadline},
sort_number = #{card.sortNumber}, author = #{card.author},
elapsed_days = #{card.elapsedDays},
procedure_id = #{card.procedureId} WHERE id=#{cardId} AND delete_status=0
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM kb_card WHERE delete_status=0 AND id= #{cardId}
